means: 伟大的( sublime的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: After microtomy the sulphur is sublimed away under vacuum.
sentence.Network_cn: 在完成切片后,可在真空下将硫升华除掉.

sentence.Network_en: The ice sublimed away, leaving the books, dry and undamaged.
sentence.Network_cn: 冰已经升华掉了, 剩下的是干燥的完好无损的书本.

sentence.Network_en: Poetic wisdom takes the appearance of feeling concentration, intuitive imagination, sublimed realm and so on.
sentence.Network_cn: 诗性智慧表现为感情的凝聚 、 直觉想象和境界的升华等方面.
